comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content: This photo is being discussed in one of the projects in the Flickr Commons group, and we would love to have this added to the group pool!

comment.author: 35113154@N06
comment._content: It's funny seeing the name "Liston" here. When I was a boy in Musselburgh in the 1960's, I had a classmate, Kate Liston, who belonged to a traditional Newhaven/Granton fishing family. This chap must be an ancestor of some sort !
